Title: AN ACT TO RELIEVE FIDEL A. REYES OF ALL RESPONSIBILITY IN CONNECTION WITH THE SHORTAGE FOUND IN THE PROPERTY ACCOUNTS OF THE BUREAU OF COMMERCE AND INDUSTRY IN THE FIRST HALF OF THE YEAR NINETEEN HUNDRED AND TWENTY-NINE.
Data:
[ Act No. 3817, December 09, 1930 ]
AN ACT TO RELIEVE FIDEL A. REYES OF ALL RESPONSIBILITY IN CONNECTION WITH THE SHORTAGE FOUND IN THE PROPERTY ACCOUNTS OF THE BUREAU OF COMMERCE AND INDUSTRY IN THE FIRST HALF OF THE YEAR NINETEEN HUNDRED AND TWENTY-NINE.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. Fidel A. Reyes, formerly Director of the Bureau of Commerce and Industry, is hereby relieved of all responsibility in connection with the shortage found in the property accounts of the Bureau of Commerce and Industry in the first half of the year nineteen hundred and twenty-nine. This Act shall not in any way affect the liability under existing law of any other officer or employee in connection with the said shortage, the discharge of Fidel A. Reyes, notwithstanding.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Effective, December 9, 1930.
